items.title: More eLife authors are linking submissions to their ORCID iDs
items.impactStatement: eLife sees positive results of requiring corresponding authors to register and link their profiles to their ORCID iDs

items.title: Media coverage: Slime can see
items.impactStatement: In their research paper – Cyanobacteria use micro-optics to sense light direction – Schuergers et al. reveal how bacterial cells act as the equivalent of a microscopic eyeball or the world’s oldest and smallest camera eye, allowing them to ‘see’.
